<CPLayoutManager> Protocol Reference

Defines a layer layout manager. All methods are optional. More...

#import <CPLayoutManager.h>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

 Invalidates the layout of a layer.

 Returns the maximum size of a layer in its coordinate system.

Detailed Description

Defines a layer layout manager. All methods are optional.

Member Function Documentation

- (void) invalidateLayoutOfLayer: (CALayer *)  layer   [optional]

Invalidates the layout of a layer.

Parameters:
layer The layer that requires layout.

This method is called when the preferred size of the layer may have changed. The receiver should invalidate any cached state.

- (void) layoutSublayersOfLayer: (CALayer *)  layer   [optional]

Layout each sublayer of the given layer.

Parameters:
layer The layer whose sublayers require layout.

The receiver should set the frame of each sublayer that requires layout.

- (CGSize) maximumSizeOfLayer: (CALayer *)  layer   [optional]

Returns the maximum size of a layer in its coordinate system.

Parameters:
layer The layer that requires layout.
Returns:
The maximum size of the layer.

If this method is not implemented the maximum size is assumed to be the size of the bounds of layer's superlayer.

- (CGSize) minimumSizeOfLayer: (CALayer *)  layer   [optional]

Returns the minimum size of a layer in its coordinate system.

Parameters:
layer The layer that requires layout.
Returns:
The minimum size of the layer.

If this method is not implemented the minimum size is assumed to be (0, 0).

- (CGSize) preferredSizeOfLayer: (CALayer *)  layer   [optional]

Returns the preferred size of a layer in its coordinate system.

Parameters:
layer The layer that requires layout.
Returns:
The preferred size of the layer.

If this method is not implemented the preferred size is assumed to be the size of the bounds of layer.
